alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Hocking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 10:09PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL FAIRFIELD AND HOCKING COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM EDT... At 1008 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Hocking Hills State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Logan, Hocking Hills State Park, Starr, Laurelville, Buena Vista in Hocking County, Gibisonville, Ilesboro, Haydenville, Lake Logan State Park, South Bloomingville, Enterprise, Union Furnace, Rockbridge and Oreville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
